languages.text: "Великий есть жизнь и есть свет. Вы же обращаете сияние Его во тьму, милость Его — в кровавую расправу".
"The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
languages.original_text: "Великий есть жизнь и есть свет. Вы же обращаете сияние Его во тьму, милость Его — в кровавую расправу".

traits.locale_text: "The Exalted One is life and light. And you lot turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
"The Exalted One is life and light. And you lot turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
"The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
"The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
"The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."
"The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

languages.text: "Der Erhabene ist Leben und ist Licht. Und doch ist es Euch irgendwie gelungen, seinen goldenen Glanz in Dunkelheit zu verwandeln und seine Gnade in brutalen Mord."
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene ist Leben und ist Licht. Und doch ist es Euch irgendwie gelungen, seinen goldenen Glanz in Dunkelheit zu verwandeln und seine Gnade in brutalen Mord."

languages.text: « L'Exalté incarne la vie et la lumière. Et pourtant, vos petits copains et vous vous êtes débrouillés pour réduire Sa radiance aux ténèbres, et Sa miséricorde à la barbarie sanguinaire. »
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

traits.locale_text: « L'Exalté incarne la vie et la lumière. Et pourtant, vos petits copains et vous vous êtes débrouillés pour réduire Sa radiance aux ténèbres, et Sa miséricorde à la barbarie sanguinaire. »

languages.text: «El Exaltado es luz y vida, y sin embargo su gente ha convertido Su brillo dorado en oscuridad y Su compasión en asesinatos sanguinarios».
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

traits.locale_text: «El Exaltado es luz y vida, y sin embargo su gente ha convertido Su brillo dorado en oscuridad y Su compasión en asesinatos sanguinarios».

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンは、生命であり、光でもある。それなのに、どういうわけか、あなた方は、その黄金の輝きを闇に変え、その慈悲を野蛮な殺人に変えてしまった」
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンは、生命であり、光でもある。それなのに、どういうわけか、あなた方は、その黄金の輝きを闇に変え、その慈悲を野蛮な殺人に変えてしまった」

languages.text: “至高无上的神皇既代表生命，又代表光明。但不知怎么回事，你们这些家伙却把祂的明光变成了黑暗，把祂的仁慈变成了野蛮的杀戮。”
languages.original_text: "The Exalted One is both life and light. And yet, somehow, you lot have managed to turn His golden glow into darkness, and His mercy into savage murder."

traits.locale_text: “至高无上的神皇既代表生命，又代表光明。但不知怎么回事，你们这些家伙却把祂的明光变成了黑暗，把祂的仁慈变成了野蛮的杀戮。”
